attributes.action: Introduce a medical card for use only by British citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A card to allow only British people the right to free medical assistance . Anybody who is not from Britain must provide an insurance certificate that covers them for any medical procedure being carried out . This is to ensure that people could not travel to this country just for free medical treatment . This would also free up the many hospital beds for people of this country who have made the necessary contributions all their working lives
